TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CompilerErrorCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供可用來儲存一組 物件的簡單集合物件。The class provides a simple collection object that can be used to store a set of objects. > [!NOTE] > 這個類別包含在類別層級套用至所有成員的繼承要求。This class contains an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. A衍生的類別並沒有完全信任權限時擲回。A is thrown when the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 如需繼承要求的詳細資訊，請參閱[繼承要求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For details about inheritance demands, see [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 類別。The following example demonstrates how to use the class. 範例會建立類別的新執行個體，並使用數種方法，將陳述式加入至集合，傳回其索引，以及新增或移除特定索引處的屬性。The example creates a new instance of the class and uses several methods to add statements to the collection, return their index, and add or remove attributes at a specific index point.
